item.title: Blazor External Login Identity Provider Google, Facebook, Microsoft, Twitter
item.description: Blazor External Login Identity Provider Google, Facebook, Microsoft, Twitter we will explore how to configure external login identity providers in a Blazor application using the appsettings.json file. We will specifically focus on configuring Google, Facebook, Microsoft, and Twitter as external login providers. Blazor: Blazor is a web framework that allows developers to build interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript. It enables full-stack development with .NET. Authentication: Authentication is the process of verifying the identity of a user.
